statements: DELETE FROM game_events WHERE event_type = 'Boss Fight' AND challenge_description LIKE '%difficult%';
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE reward_value = 100 AND player_id = 1;
DELETE FROM challenges WHERE challenge_name = 'Puzzle Challenge' AND challenge_difficulty > 5;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 100 AND challenge_id = 10;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 202 AND challenge_id = 303 AND progress_percentage > 50;
